config.question: The concept of “direct primary,” which formed a crucial part of political reforms being initiated by the progressives, allowed __________.

choices.content: voters rather than parties to choose candidates
voters to recall representatives in case of poor performance
the voting public to directly elect the president
voters to fix terms for local government officials

answer_3.response: Placing government in the hands of experts was one way to get it out of the hands of politicians and political parties. The direct primary, which allowed voters rather than parties to choose candidates, was another way.
